Example

This example first deducts 100px from the total 100%. Then it calculates the flexes.

Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {

    layout : {
        type: 'hbox',
        align: 'middle',
        pack : 'end'
    },

    defaults: {
        style: 'background: blue',
        margin: 5,
        xtype: 'container',
    },
    items : [ {
        html : 'Panel Left',
        flex: 1
    }, {
        html : 'Panel Two',
        width: 100
    }, {
        html : 'Panel Three',
        flex: 3
    } ],

    height : 300,
    width : 500,
    renderTo : Ext.getBody()
});
